snippet: An Oklahoma court has rescheduled executions so that state prison officials have more time to find a supply of lethal drugs.
abstract: Oklahoma's Court of Criminal Appeals reschedules executions of Clayton Lockett and Charles Warner so that state prison officials have more time to find supply of lethal drugs.
lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma court has rescheduled executions so that state prison officials have more time to find a supply of lethal drugs.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Shortage of Drugs Delays Executions
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Shortage of Drugs Delays Executions
